text: Approval for the LUTONIX 035 Drug Coated Balloon PTA Catheter.  This device is indicated for percutaneous transluminal angioplasty (PTA), after pre-dilatation, for the treatment of stenotic lesions in dysfunctional native arteriovenous dialysis fistulae that are 4 mm to 12 mm in diameter and up to 80 mm in length.
